title: sumukhi ninnuL
sahitya:
sumukhi ninnuL tApattinu sUryOdayattil gADha timira bhOgyAkum dasha samuprtayAyi


anupallavi

  cirakAla prOSitanantE jIva nAyakaninnu paramamOda bhAram pUNDu varikayAlahO


caraNam 1    cEndarshara sAyaka vicitamA kundava cAru candElum kongayEcErkkum kAntanu rasA
    caraNam 2    viraha kadana mAkavE varatanu tavAdhunA paramAtma shrI padmanAbhan paricil tIrttiDum
